TopicTitle: What do you think is next (.24)

Articles.Content: I'm pretty sure you get warned for bumping.

I want contracts.

I need real staying power to this game. Right now its, "Oh, I launched a rocket to Eeloo base, cool, now what?".

And I can't wait for my save to be wiped so I can start all over (Seriously, look at my ribbons. I've been throughout the entire system. I WANT MOAR).

I like starting all over.

I want contracts.

I need real staying power to this game. Right now its, "Oh, I launched a rocket to Eeloo base, cool, now what?".

And I can't wait for my save to be wiped so I can start all over (Seriously, look at my ribbons. I've been throughout the entire system. I WANT MOAR).

I like starting all over.

In all seriousness, you can always try to build your rockets to be reusable, focus on building a base on another world, or even just add more planets using one of the extra planets mods.
